Description.Text: The Works Aparthotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Manchester. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, ticket service, express check-in/check-out, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park. Internet access â€“ wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, desk, balcony/terrace can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at The Works Aparthotel.
